projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Title: Development of Customer facing webapp integrated with ERP platform, Project 2 Title: Development of HRMS portal and field professional operations app,
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title: Development of Customer facing webapp integrated with ERP platform


Description: Web app for all customer business interactions-reports, spares, finance

information and communication which is then linked with Companyâ€™s internal ERP

Skill sets: Frontend Developer-React.js/MySQL; Backend developer-Node.js/Express.js/Restful

APIs/MySQL (must have projects built using above in his/her portfolio)

Expected learning: Hands-on experience on enterprise product development including project

operations, procurement and field planning & tracking

Specific courses required for project execution: Course on Javascript, MySQL, frameworks and

libraries of Javascript- React and Express/Node, API integration and development

Project 2 Title: Development of HRMS portal and field professional operations app


Description: Payroll processing, attendance and leave management, expenses, feedback of

projects


Skill sets: Frontend Developer-React.js and redux/MySQL/UI designing; Backend developer-

Node.js/Express.js/Restful APIs/MySQL (must have projects built using above in his/her portfolio)


Expected learning: Hands-on experience on enterprise HRIS and employee payroll processing

Specific courses required for project execution: Course on Javascript, MySQL, frameworks and

libraries of Javascript- React and Express/Node, API development


Project 3 Title: Revamping and developing mega responsive, world-class company website


Description: Since inception, the organization has grown in leaps and bounds and offer a lot

more services than what we started with. Objective is to create such a website with focus on

branding/awareness aspects.

Skill sets: Frontend Developer-React.js/Javascript/UI design(must have projects built using above in

his/her portfolio)

Expected learning: Hands-on experience on designing and developing websites with guiding

principles and standard practices

Specific courses required for project execution: Course on Javascript, MySQL, frameworks and

libraries of Javascript- React and UI designing
